# recursive sequence generation
 
 Write a program for generating m-sequences 0 and 1 satisfying both requirements:

1) the number of zeros must be odd;

2) the number of zeros must be less than the number of ones by no more than 3.

```cpp
(new Generator)->generate(100);

/*
0
01
10
011
101
110
0111
1011
1101
1110
01111
10111
11011
11101
11110
000
0001
0010
0100
1000
00011
00101
00110
01001
01010
01100
10001
10010
10100
11000
000111
001011
001101
001110
010011
010101
010110
011001
011010
011100
100011
100101
100110
101001
101010
101100
110001
110010
110100
111000
0001111
0010111
0011011
0011101
0011110
0100111
0101011
0101101
0101110
0110011
0110101
0110110
0111001
0111010
0111100
1000111
1001011
1001101

1010011

1010110

1100011

```
